product_name: Outdoor Research Transfer Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The women's breathable, stretch-woven Outdoor Research Transfer Jacket protects you during transitions from high energy to stopping with its wind protection and a soft fleece interior. Nylon stretch shell resists wind and water. Fleece lining provides light insulation ideal for milder backcountry days, skate skiing and shoulder season activities. Adjustable cuffs seal out weather. Brushed-tricot-lined collar feels good next to the skin. Outdoor Research Transfer Jacket for women features zippered hand pockets and a zippered arm pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The women's breathable, stretch-woven Outdoor Research Transfer Jacket protects you during transitions from high energy to stopping with its wind protection and a soft fleece interior.
